casebody.data:
Augustin VALDEZ, Jr., Appellant, v. Herbert BROWNELL, Jr., as Attorney General of the United States,* Appellee. No. 13860. United States Court of Appeals Ninth Circuit. Nov. 12, 1954. Philip Newman, Newman & Newman, Los Angeles, Cal., for appellant. Laughlin E. Waters, U. S. Atty., Cecil Hicks, Clyde C. Downing, Robert K. Grean, Asst. U. S. Attys., Los Angeles, Cal., for appellee.

Before MATHEWS and ORR, Circuit Judges, and WIIG, District Judge.

Attorney General Brownell was substituted for Attorney General McGranery on March 3, 1953.

 PER CURIAM.

On the grounds and for the reasons stated in its opinion, Valdez v. McGranery, D.C.S.D.Cal., 114 F.Supp. 173, the judgment of the District Court is affirmed.
